displayProperties.name: Clan
displayProperties.description: About your clan, its roster, summative historical stats for all members, and admin mode.

displayProperties.name: About
displayProperties.description: About your clan and what it stands for

displayProperties.name: Roster
displayProperties.description: Find friends to play with

displayProperties.name: Admin
displayProperties.description: Take action on clan matters and members

displayProperties.name: Historical Stats
displayProperties.description:
Compare players over stats, broken down by activity mode.

For more information on the accuracy of these stats, check out [Frequently Asked Questions](/addendums/faq).

displayProperties.name: Relationships
displayProperties.description: Discover missed opportunities and secret lovers. These Guardians are those who you play most activities with. Cherish each other.

displayProperties.name: Collections
displayProperties.description: Items your Guardian has acquired over their lifetime.

displayProperties.name: Sets
displayProperties.description: Curated collections of precious goods from specific places including raids and dungeons.

displayProperties.name: Lore
displayProperties.description: Lore tells broader stories from the Destiny universe. Unlock and read lore pages by completing Triumphs

displayProperties.name: Patterns & Catalysts
displayProperties.description: Patterns enable the shaping of weapons. Catalysts expand the power of your Exotic weapons. Find them and finish their objectives to unlock your arsenal's full potential

displayProperties.name: Medals
displayProperties.description: Medals are earned through feats of gameplay expertise. See the list of medals and how many of each you've earned

displayProperties.name: Stat Trackers
displayProperties.description: Stat trackers can be applied to your emblem from its inspect view. Applied trackers will appear on your nameplate whenever visible

displayProperties.name: Explorer
displayProperties.description: A structured, hierarchical look into your Collections. Expand and collapse nodes to trace your journey from broad pursuits to specific feats. Compare progress with fireteam members, clanmates, or others—directly within the table. Every checkbox tells a story.

displayProperties.name: Triumphs
displayProperties.description: Triumphs your Guardian has achieved through their trials.

displayProperties.name: Active Triumphs and Seals
displayProperties.description: Records of the Guardian's achievements. Challenge yourself according to the objectives found herein for fame, glory, and prizes.

displayProperties.name: Legacy Triumphs and Seals
displayProperties.description: Triumphs from the past, these records are no longer obtainable but are preserved here for posterity and review.

displayProperties.name: Tracked Triumphs
displayProperties.description: See here all triumphs which you've tracked.

displayProperties.name: User Hidden Triumphs
displayProperties.description: Triumphs which you've opted to hide. Who hurt you?

displayProperties.name: Unredeemed Triumphs
displayProperties.description: It's time to work those fingers and redeem some triumphs.

displayProperties.name: Near Triumphs
displayProperties.description: Priority objectives according to your sort criteria. These triumphs are almost ripe for the picking.

displayProperties.name: Transient Triumphs
displayProperties.description: Not all Triumphs are forever–complete these records with haste or be lost forever in time.

displayProperties.name: Explorer
displayProperties.description: A structured, hierarchical look into your Triumphs. Expand and collapse nodes to trace your journey from broad pursuits to specific feats. Compare progress with fireteam members, clanmates, or others—directly within the table. Every checkbox tells a story.

displayProperties.name: Journey
displayProperties.description: Navigate your Guardian's journey from New Light to Paragon.

displayProperties.name: Commendations
displayProperties.description: Celebrate your fireteam's successes and award them tokens of your thoughtfulness.

displayProperties.name: Maps
displayProperties.description: Interactive maps charting checklists and other notable destinations.

displayProperties.name: Checklists
displayProperties.description: Ghost scans and item checklists spanning the Sol system

displayProperties.name: Operations
displayProperties.description: A Guardian's guide to ongoing operations with tips for prestige and triumph.

displayProperties.name: Active Event
displayProperties.description: Complete limited-time challenges to earn various rewards in a limited-time event.

displayProperties.name: Seasonal Challenges
displayProperties.description: Complete limited-time challenges for Season rank, Bright Dust, and other rewards.

displayProperties.name: Rotations
displayProperties.description: Rituals that run on a rotation, use these projections to plan your endeavours. Rotations are sometimes altered by the Architects and this view will be updated accordingly.

displayProperties.name: Character
displayProperties.description: Review your Guardian's equipment and inventory.

displayProperties.name: Equipment
displayProperties.description: Evaluate your Guardian's battle readiness

displayProperties.name: Inventory
displayProperties.description:
Postmaster Frames dutifully oversee deliveries, messages, and lost items.
Maybe they can help you with your other supplies and materials too.

displayProperties.name: Vault
displayProperties.description: Safe storage for general items. Accessible to all your characters.

displayProperties.name: Vendors
displayProperties.description: Spy on your favourite task delegators and trading partners.

displayProperties.name: Loadouts
displayProperties.description: Preconfigure your equipment, strap it up, and name it.

displayProperties.name: Quests
displayProperties.description: Track your pursuits, including quests and bounties.

displayProperties.name: Bounties
displayProperties.description:
The operatives of the Tower and inhabitants sprawled accross the system have tasks for you. They offer rich experiences and other currencies for their completion.

These are all of the selected Guardian's bounties.

displayProperties.name: Pathfinder
displayProperties.description: The Pathfinder is an astronomical instrument, guiding Guardians to the treasures of the cosmos, while allowing them to define their own journey.

displayProperties.name: Activity
displayProperties.description: Explore and filter your Post Game Carnage Reports in detail.

displayProperties.name: Carnage
displayProperties.description: All of the selected Guardian's recent activities.

displayProperties.name: Bookmarks
displayProperties.description:
A record of your victories, satisfaction, and dismay.

Here lies all activities which you've added to your bookmarks. Stand tall, Guardian, and bask in your glory.

displayProperties.name: Graphs
displayProperties.description: Activities plotted against graphs, for the statistically inclined.

displayProperties.name: Series
displayProperties.description: Triumph under the most perilous conditions, reports of your fireteams' first victories against our greatest adversaries.

displayProperties.name: Settings
displayProperties.description: Destiny profile, settings synchronisation, language, item visibility, theme, and more—these settings affect how you enjoy Braytech.

displayProperties.name: Advanced
displayProperties.description: Performance, debugging, and storage management. No one has fun here.

displayProperties.name: Push Notifications
displayProperties.description: Control how Braytech reaches you when you're not using it.

displayProperties.name: Subscriptions
displayProperties.description: Support Braytech's development and get "rizz'd up" with perks.

displayProperties.name: Legend
displayProperties.description: Brandish your profile with a unique username, select a highlight, choose a default character for shared links, and more.

displayProperties.name: Legend
displayProperties.description: Your story, your legend. A detailed chronicle of your Guardian's accomplishments and stats, ready to inspire allies and intimidate foes.

displayProperties.name: Archives
displayProperties.description: Interactive tools, manuals, legends, and other content, preserved by the Cryptarchs for future generations.

displayProperties.name: Frequently Asked Questions
displayProperties.description: The frequently asked and easy to answer...

displayProperties.name: Privacy
displayProperties.description: Respecting personal boundaries.

displayProperties.name: Credits
displayProperties.description: The Guardians who make it possible.

displayProperties.name: Leaderboards
displayProperties.description: Climb the ranks and see how you measure up! Compare scores across Active Triumphs, Legacy Triumphs, Seals, Gilds, and Collections—individually or with your clan.

displayProperties.name: Fireteam Monitor
displayProperties.description: _You_ are the control centre.

displayProperties.name: Manifest
displayProperties.description: An archive of manifest versions and definitions.

displayProperties.name: Dresstiny
displayProperties.description: Welcome to the fashion show. Take your time, browse a little, or perhaps start a trend...
